response.original_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Scott Rosenberg
response.overview: Screenwriter Scott Rosenberg -- whose credits include Gone in 60 Seconds and the BAFTA-nominated High Fidelity -- shares his methods, experiences, insights and secrets about writing for Hollywood in this revealing interview. "The Dialogue" is a series of in-depth discussions with top screenwriters, hosted by industry veteran and film fanatic Mike De Luca.
response.title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Scott Rosenberg
